House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To authorize appropriations for the Merit Systems Protection Board.

summary.text: Amends the Whistleblower Protection Act of 1989 to authorize appropriations for the Merit Systems Protection Board without fiscal year limitation (currently, appropriations are authorized through FY 1994).

titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the Merit Systems Protection Board.
